post: Max I totally agree with your assertion that the work can be a very polarizing depending on the image science methodology used to quantify your conclusion. The fact is I’m learning to understand the protocol on peer review work and dismiss my own bias when I see the main foundation of the premise flawed compared with my own perspective. However, I’m still mystified why after 30 plus years we’re still wrestling with this topic about the Lepton coin..
